1: @@//cad de ni 'grub par bya//de nas ji <mistake>lra ra</mistake> thams cad rjes su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin zhe na/rdo rje dril bu 'dzin 'gyur nas//bzlas pa'i <mistake>drial</mistake> bu dkrol bar <mistake>bya //rtog</mistake> pa thams cad
2: rjes grub <mistake>pas //mchog</mistake> gi dang po 'grub pa'o//de la ji ltar rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bsgrub <mistake>ba</mistake> thams cad kyi rgyu yin zhe na/o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i//nub las dang <mistake>bo</mistake> yang yin
3: te//shar las dang po bzung nas su//lci bar <mistake>ai</mistake> yig ldan par bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig le u yig sbyor bar <mistake>bya//lhols</mistake> dbu ma bzung ba <mistake>la//tshg</mistake> drag yang
4: dag ldan par bya//the tshom med par de las 'dis//rjes su sbyor bar ldan par 'grub//lho las dang po bzung nas su//gnyis pa la ni ldan par bya//nan tan gyis ni i yig sbyor//
5: skad cig ma las gcod 'gyur ro//de nyid <mistake>the</mistake> <mistake>lhe dang</mistake> ldan pas//byang las dbu <mistake>myang</mistake> yin te//de nyid <mistake>lag</mistake> <mistake>nyis</mistake> brjod par bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la <mistake>yang//thig</mistake> le u yig ldan
6: par ni//drug par yongs su grags pa yin//dbus las <mistake>gnyes</mistake> pa gang yin pa//nub las dang po yang <mistake>yan</mistake> te//de ni a med shes bya ste//skad cig mas ni bdud rtsi <mistake>'grub//ao</mistake> yig
7: thig le dang ldan par//yi ge u yig <mistake>mnam</mistake> ldan pa'i//dbang ldan phyi rol pa yang bya//me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//yi ge <mistake>a</mistake> <mistake>dang mnyam</mistake> ldan pa//shar <mistake>kyi</mistake> <mistake>dag</mistake> po ldan par bya//
8: tsheg drag u yig ldan pa yi//dbus kyi tha ma ldan par bya//thams cad kyi ni sgrub byed pa//khrag 'thung zhes pa 'byung ba'o//ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrub bya <mistake>'grub//denas</mistake> <mistake>phyin</mistake> ci 'dod par//
